DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety immunogenicity Pediacel® infants toddler give 2,3,4 12-18 month age . Primary Objectives : - To compare post-dose 3 immunogenicity Pediacel® Infanrix®-IPV+Hib co-administered Prevenar® . - To describe post-dose 3 pertussis antibody response . Secondary Objectives : - To compare post-dose 4 immunogenicity Pediacel® Infanrix®-IPV+Hib co-administered Prevenar® . - To describe safety vaccination follow co-administration Prevenar® .
